boardgame.name: Monster Lands
Říše příšer
boardgame.description: Monster Lands is a competitive dice-placement game that combines resource management, worker placement, and fun combat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You will take on the role of the leader of a small clan of brave warriors, competing to win the crown of the Lands of the Discord. You will visit buildings within the Citadel, the last bastion against the monsters that have overrun the kingdom, and also travel to the outside, the areas surrounding the Citadel, where you will battle monsters and reclaim the lands for the Queen._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of the game, the crown is handed to the clan with most victory points, which are gained by amassing glory, reputation, gold, and trophies from defeating monsters. The most important factor is glory; to gain it you must leave the safety of the Citadel and undertake missions, defeat or capture monsters, and conquer lands._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Your mercenaries provide you with dice, which you will use to take actions using a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;worker-placement_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; mechanic. In the Citadel, your dice allow you to improve your clan, acquiring hunting tools, shields, potions, venoms, mercenaries, and more. The timing of your dice placement and the type of dice you use affects both yourself and other players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the Outside, your dice become battle tools. You roll them in missions and battles to try and defeat monsters or reconquer the land. If you plan well, you will have many ways to manipulate your dice results and increase your chance of success. You cannot simply hope for lucky rolls to snatch the crown, you will need to carefully manage your resources and do some proper planning to be successful._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Do you have what it takes to go for the crown?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Monster Lands Kickstarter Monster Pledge with Heavy Weapons expansion, Solo Dice expansion, and promo cards. Includes: * Monster Lands Core Game (with limited edition box) * Color Printed Wooden Tokens * Customized Dice * All Stretch Goals including 24 Kickstarter Exclusives * Heavy Weapons Expansion * Solo Dice Expansion _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 5th Player Expansion * 4 Exclusive Promo Cards This is a pre-order. Monster Lands is slated for a Sept 2018 delivery. Payment for the game will be expected now with an additional payment for shipping as soon as it is delivered. I will do my best to ship this as economically as possible and will work with you to use whichever carrier you prefer. I will be happy to ship outside of the US, but know that the price for shipping internationally can be expensive. Again, I will do everything I can to ship this as economically as possible.
Monster Lands board game Monster KS pledge level includes upgraded components plus all stretch goals and KS exclusives

NIS Monster lands monster pledge PLUS heavy weapons and 5th player expansion. Very few for sale at this time. Will ship on Thursday or Friday 10/18-19 if paid before 9am on Thursday. Local pickup in Austin Texas available. You pay shipping costs, about $23 to most places in the US. Sale price includes sales tax. Venmo preferred.

Monster Lands Kickstarter Monster Pledge with the wooden tokens, the Heavy Weapons expansion add-on, and the separate promo cards add-on that became available after the campaign ended. In hand, ships right away. Box has a VERY small corner ding from shipping.
Kickstarter Monster Pledge with the upgraded components and all stretch goals. Shrink was coming off when it arrived, so I just removed it. Other than that it is brand new.
KS Monster Edition with 5th player expansion. Opened just to check components.

Monster Lands KS Deluxe Version (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Monster_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) which includes a lot of Extras and wodden conponents WITH the Addon-Promo Card Set! Usually not included. I dont have the game yet! I will deliver the game as soon as i get it. Postage: DHL Price, insured.

Shipping will be approx. $25. I accept paypal to hankheyming@gmail.com and can generally ship same day.

BEZAHLUNG: - Paypal normal oder Family and Friends - Überweisung auf mein Bankkonto - Bar bei Abholung oder Treffen, falls ich mal bei Euch durch komme in nächster Zeit : D

I played the game twice and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling it together with the expansion. It is the Kickstarter-Version with all the wooden components. The game is language independent. So if you download the english or other rules it is no problem to play it. If you pay want to pay with PayPal, I would like to say that I won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t pay any PayPal fees.

Monster Pledge Kickstarter Edition + Heavy Weapons Expansion/Erweiterung + Kickstarter Promos + Pledge Manager Promos + Man vs Meeple Promo + Deutsche Anleitung/German Rulebook! Das ist der Monster-Pledge mit den Holzmarkern und den Monster-Würfeln. Das Spiel ist geöffnet da ich es auch auf Vollständigkeit geprüft habe. Die Karten sind allerdings noch verschweißt. Versand: 6 Euro innerhalb von Deutschland
New

Game is in excellent, like new condition. Game was played about a half round solo and then was packed up and never picked up again. This is the monster pledge level which comes with extra expansions and wooden replacement tokens. The retail cardboard tokens were also in the box and are included. The game also came with a glossy box sleeve which is included as well. The sleeve does have a little wear _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; tear since putting the game box inside the sleeve is fairly difficult and hard to do without slightly chaffing the edges of the sleeve but I tried my best. Everything was punched out and sorted into included bags. NOTE: Due to manufacturing defects, there is one card that arrived slightly bent. I e-mailed them about it and they are aware and will hopefully send out a replacement card. If I receive it I will mail it to you when I get it. Shipping will be via USPS or UPS, whichever is cheaper.
